metadata.title: CVE-2024-52763 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the component/graph_all_periods.php of Ganglia-web v3.73 to v3.75 allows attackers toexecute arbitrary web scripts or HTML via a crafted payload injected intothe "g" parameter.

criterions.comment: ganglia-web package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
